descripcion: Oro Verde Guayaquil, offers an exquisite combination of European experience and Ecuadorian hospitality. Our full-service, downtown hotel offers the ultimate in sophistication and comfort for business and leisure travelers alike. Our hotel's superb location in the Guayaquil commercial and financial district means you are within walking distance of popular tourist attractions, entertainment and shopping as well as cultural and historical sites. The hotel is also just a quick eight-minute drive from the airport and offers complimentary transfers.
facilidades: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: Welcome to Hotel Malecon Inn, your Guayaquil “home away from home.” Hotel Malecon Inn aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.

Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Mirador Bellavista (1.5 mi) and George Capwell Stadium (1.9 mi), guests of Hotel Malecon Inn can easily experience some of Guayaquil's most well known attractions.
Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Hotel Malecon Inn makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the motel, including a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage. In addition, guests can enjoy a fitness center during their visit.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Guayaquil's popular shrimp restaurants such as La Canoa, Caracol Azul, and Lo Nuestro Cafe - Restaurant, all a short distance from Hotel Malecon Inn.
During your visit, be sure to check out Parque Historico Guayaquil (0.2 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the motel.
Hotel Malecon Inn puts the best of Guayaquil at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
Finding an ideal hotel in Guayaquil does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Andes Inn, a nice option for travelers like you.
While staying at Hotel Andes Inn, visitors can check out El Castillo Chocolate Farm (1.3 mi) and La Perla (1.3 mi), some of Guayaquil's top attractions.
Rooms at Hotel Andes Inn offer air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with wifi.
Room service is one of the conveniences offered at this hotel.
If you like pubs, Hotel Andes Inn is conveniently located near Mami-T Santa Ana, La Paleta...en las rocas, and Rayuela.
Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular gardens, such as Botanical Garden of Guayaquil, Parque Seminario, and Jardines del Malecón Simón Bolíva.
Hotel Andes Inn looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Guayaquil.
Airport Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Guayaquil, offering a budget friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
The rooms offer air conditioning and a desk, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Airport Hotel features a 24 hour front desk and room service. In addition, as a valued Airport Hotel guest, you can enjoy a pool and a lounge that are available on-site.
Close to some of Guayaquil's most popular landmarks, such as El Castillo Chocolate Farm (1.7 mi) and El Faro de Guayaquil (1.8 mi), Airport Hotel is a great destination for tourists.
Travelers looking to enjoy some ribs can head to Tony Roma's. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Mediterranean restaurant such as Riviera, La Casa di Carlo, or Tratoria Piccolo Mondo.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular art galleries such as Casa Marin.
Enjoy your stay in Guayaquil!
facilidades: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: See why so many travelers make Hotel Sander their hotel of choice when visiting Guayaquil. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Iglesia San Francisco (0.5 mi) and Captain Morgan's Pirate Ship (0.7 mi), guests of Hotel Sander can easily experience some of Guayaquil's most well known attractions.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning and a desk, and guests can go online with wifi offered by the hotel.

Hotel Sander features a 24 hour front desk, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Hotel Sander, there is paid private parking available nearby.
While in Guayaquil be sure to experience nearby seafood restaurants such as Caracol Azul, La Pata Gorda, or La Pata Gorda.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out an art gallery, such as Casa Marin.
At Hotel Sander, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Guayaquil.

See why so many travelers make Hotel Rizzo their hotel of choice when visiting Guayaquil. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Hotel Rizzo is a budget friendly hotel offering air conditioning and a minibar in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features room service. Plus, guests can enjoy an on-site restaurant, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Guayaquil.
While staying at Hotel Rizzo, visitors can check out Iglesia San Francisco (0.2 mi) and Captain Morgan's Pirate Ship (0.2 mi), some of Guayaquil's top attractions.
If you are looking for a good diner, you may want to check out Ville Crepes, Pollos De Boncho, or Big Boy Burger while staying at Hotel Rizzo.
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Malecon 2000 (0.5 mi), Las Penas (1.1 mi), and Cerro Santa Ana (1.1 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Rizzo as you experience all of the things Guayaquil has to offer.

Dreamkapture is only 10 minutes away from the bus terminal and the airport. Dreamkapture Hostel is located in the suburb of Alborada just north of the center of the city. There are many great restaurants nearby where you can enjoy local crab dishes, ceviches, and other typical foods. Dreamkapture is located near shopping, restaurants, and theaters. Our neighborhood is friendly and the people are nice and helpful. Members of our office staff speak Spanish and English and offer great information about Guayaquil. Our hostel is a friendly and comfortable place where happy people are always welcome!

HOTEL LAS PEÑAS is located in the Commercial and Financial area of the city. 10 minutes from International Airport J. J. De Olmedo and surrounded by the principal tourism places like: Pier 2000, Iguanas Park and Las Peñas Neighborhood and Puerto Santa Ana. The Hotel has 30 different rooms totally equipped: Single, Married, Double, Threefold and Fourfold. Cafeteria “Las Peñas”, Room Service, Laundry Service and Telephone Service.
Mansion del Rio is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Guayaquil, offering a luxury environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Mansion del Rio is a luxury small hotel offering air conditioning and a desk in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.

The small hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and a sun terrace. Plus, guests can enjoy free breakfast, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Guayaquil. For guests with a vehicle, there is paid private parking available on-site.
Nearby landmarks such as Catedral Metropolitana de Guayaquil (1.4 mi) and Malecon 2000 (1.4 mi) make Mansion del Rio a great place to stay when visiting Guayaquil.

Guayaquil has plenty of Mediterranean restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Riviera, Tratoria Piccolo Mondo, and La Casa di Carlo, which are serving up some great dishes.

If you’re looking for something to do, Las Penas (0.1 mi), Cerro Santa Ana (0.1 mi), and El Castillo Chocolate Farm (0.6 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Mansion del Rio.
Enjoy your stay in Guayaquil!

Welcome to the Hotel Alexander, the place where you will enjoy comfortable rooms with air conditioning, cable TV, hot water, private bathroom (steam-jacuzzi) at a very affordable prices. We are in the center of Guayaquil, city considered as the main port of Ecuador, which makes it one of the biggest tourist attractions in the country. Besides being close to the most important sites of the city, the Hotel Alexander offers the tourist an excellent national and international attention, hospitality and human warmth to make you feel like home.

Located in Guayaquil, 12 km from Saint Francis Church, Luxva Hotel Boutique provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a tennis court. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms.
facilidades: Photo copier / fax In business center

nombre: Hello! Las Peñas Siglo XXI B&B

descripcion: Unique among Guayaquil hotel's offer, IGUANAZÚ feels truly residential, like a home away from home. For this reason Nazu House appeals not only to independent travellers and foreigners, but also for families, groups and locals seeking for a peaceful break. Pet friendly.

nombre: Hoteles en Guayaquil - Suites Guayaquil Cerca del Aeropuerto
descripcion: Guayaquil Suites hotel, we offer a space for rest and if business is our location is very privileged is in step Guayaquil airport, bus terminal Guayaquil, Guayaquil Convention Center and Mall del Sol Shopping Center. Hotels Guayaquil Guayaquil hotel has rooms: Type: Double, triple, double and single, all with cable TV, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, free local calls, private bathroom with hot shower, Garage, Safe, Maintenance and Cleaning Daily with room service ,; Spread over 3 floors for your entire comfort. The best memory who will visit Ecuador Guayaquil, is the quality and warmth of its people, kind and honest, with good costumbrestos that will surprise anyone who has the opportunity to treat Hotel in Guayaquil

El Hotel GH Galería esta ubicado en Guayaquil, dispone de 94 habitaciones perfectamente equipadas, dos salas de reuniones equipadas con medios audiovisuales avanzados, y una gran selección de comodidades y servicios. También dispone de restaurante, gimnasio, recepción 24 horas, cafetería, entre otros.
